name: Mini Warriors: Brawler Army
description:
Mini Warriors: Brawler Army is a mix of strategy and action. Deploy your army of hundreds, join them into the battlefield surrounded by the enemies, control the commander to assault, hack and slash, then win.

New battle experience with random generated map


The game uses random maps. The player needs to explore new level and fight against different enemies every time, the battle scenes will reset upon the player’s death and different levels.

Multiple heroes available, you can always find one that fits you.


For now, there are eighteen different heroes available. Each hero can lead troops to form an army.Each of them has their own play style. Deploy your army of hundreds, join them into the battlefield surrounded by the enemies, control the commander to assault, hack and slash.

hack & slash



Game features


  • Unique 3D view inside the battlefield
  • Hundreds vs hundreds
  • Command, assault, hack and slash
  • Dozens of heroes and various units
  • One minute quick battle
